meta.title: Duchess Trapped in Hyper Invisible Box

beats.visual: Spotlight snaps on; Duchess pats the air, hits unseen wall.
beats.gag_note: Sound effect of gentle glass ping.

beats.visual: Duchess traces box outline; sparkles mark imaginary edges.
Invisible elevator lever lowers Duchess dramatically.
Duchess pulls invisible rope; imaginary anvil hovers overhead.
Invisible door opens; Duchess smacks into side panel.
Duchess climbs invisible ladder, floating higher with each paw.
Box suddenly shrinks; Duchess's whiskers squish comically.
Invisible confetti rains as Duchess escapes with flourish.
Duchess runs into new wall, shrugs to camera.

tts_line: Duchess keeps finding walls that only exist in mime-land.
style_prompt: cartoon elegant black cat, satin sheen, clean bold outlines, flat jewel-tone accents, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, spotlit stage with invisible box mimed by cartoon cat, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
